about.title: Skill Overview.
introParagraphs:
I am an **application-driven AI Engineer** with a strong background in machine learning and deep learning, specializing in **LLMs, NLP, and explainable AI.**

I have developed **medical and biomedical AI projects,** including biomedical literature analysis, medical information retrieval, and image recognition tasks, and have experience collaborating across interdisciplinary teams. I am familiar with the full implementation pipeline, from **data preprocessing and model training (fine-tuning) to inference deployment.**

I have completed my master’s degree and military service, and I am currently seeking a **long-term full-time AI Engineer position.**

highlights.title: Applied AI & Machine Learning
items:
End-to-end Machine Learning / Deep Learning workflows, including data preprocessing, model training and evaluation, and inference deployment.

Hands-on experience with PyTorch and TensorFlow, and practical experience in optimizing models with performance–cost trade-offs.

highlights.title: Medical & Biomedical AI
items:
Experience in developing AI solutions for medical and biomedical applications, including literature analysis, information retrieval, and image recognition tasks.

Familiar with cross-domain collaboration environments and capable of handling domain-specific data.

highlights.title: LLM & NLP Systems
items:
Hands-on experience with large language models (LLMs) and natural language processing (NLP) applications, including transformer model fine-tuning, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) workflow development, and chatbot building.

Experience integrating LLM inference through APIs into practical systems.

highlights.title: Front End Web Development & Productization
items: Front end experience ( React / Flask ). Able to productize research prototypes into usable web systems with end-to-end user flow.
Experienced in integrating model inference into practical systems via APIs and delivering interpretable outputs.

Developed an explainable literature assistance system that provides query capabilities, literature retrieval, prediction, and evidence sentence highlighting, with outputs designed for clinical/user scenarios.
